doc:
Robin Ellis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robin_Ellis 0 Anthony Robin Ellis (born 8 January 1942) is an English actor best known for his role as Captain Ross Poldark in 29 episodes of the BBC classic series Poldark, adapted from a series of books by the late British author Winston Graham. He also appeared in Fawlty Towers, Cluedo, The Good Soldier (an adaptation of the Ford Madox Ford novel), Elizabeth R (playing Essex), The Moonstone, Bel Ami, Sense and Sensibility (which also featured Clive Francis), The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes, She Loves Me (in which he sings) and Blue Remembered Hills (written by Dennis Potter). In 2015, 2016 and 2017 he appeared in Poldark as Reverend Halse. Anthony_Robin_Ellis ( born 8_January_1942 ) is an_English_actor best_known for his_role as Captain_Ross_Poldark in 29_episodes of the_BBC_classic_series_Poldark , adapted from a_series of books by the_late_British_author_Winston_Graham . He also appeared in Fawlty_Towers , Cluedo , The_Good_Soldier ( an_adaptation of the_Ford_Madox_Ford_novel_) , Elizabeth_R_( playing Essex_) , The_Moonstone , Bel_Ami , Sense_and_Sensibility ( which also featured Clive_Francis_) , The_Casebook of Sherlock_Holmes , She Loves Me ( in which he sings )_and_Blue_Remembered_Hills (_written by Dennis_Potter_) . In 2015_,_2016_and_2017 he appeared in Poldark as Reverend_Halse .
